comments.raw_text:
As a starting point pt-BR will use the same search engines that en-US uses. I landed the searchplugins with no changes already. Sorry I forgot to file this bug first.

http://hg.mozilla.org/releases/l10n/mozilla-aurora/pt-BR/rev/0815d815be0d
comments.author: hultmann@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
Thanks for filing the bug. That's fine for en-US for now. I've accepted the previously rejected sign-offs now that we have this bug.


Please leave this bug open for when you are ready for the locale specific search engine list.
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Maykon Chagas [:mchagas] from comment #3)
> I don't think this is on the right Produt/Component, this is nothing about
> Localization, so I'll move it to the right Product/Component.

Actually, search engines bugs are kept in Mozilla Localization components: discussion happens with the localization team, and the change needs to land in the l10n repo.
